Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    vialab.SMT.TouchClient
    Use SMT instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    vialab.SMT.Zone.direct
    use setDirect( boolean) instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.height
    use Zone.(get|set)(Width|Height) instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.physics
    use Zone.setPhysicsEnabled( boolean) instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.stealChildrensTouch
    we're working on a better alternative
    vialab.SMT.Zone.width
    use Zone.(get|set)(Width|Height) instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.x
    use Zone.(get|set)(X|Y) instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.y
    use Zone.(get|set)(X|Y) instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    vialab.SMT.Zone.beginPickDraw()
    This is no longer needed by anything.
    vialab.SMT.Zone.beginTouch()
    This is no longer needed by anything.
    vialab.SMT.Zone.disableScalingLimit()
    this feature is currently broken with no immediate plans for repair
    vialab.SMT.Zone.drawImpl()
    override draw instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.enableScalingLimit(int, int, int, int)
    this feature is currently broken with no immediate plans for repair
    vialab.SMT.Zone.endPickDraw()
    This is no longer needed by anything.
    vialab.SMT.Zone.endTouch()
    This is no longer needed by anything.
    vialab.SMT.SMT.get(String, Class<T>)
    vialab.SMT.Zone.getBoundObject()
    Do not use this method - See this github issue
    vialab.SMT.Zone.keyPressedImpl(KeyEvent)
    override keyPressed instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.keyReleasedImpl(KeyEvent)
    override keyReleased instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.keyTypedImpl(KeyEvent)
    override keyTyped instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.pickDrawImpl()
    override pickDraw instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.pressImpl(Touch)
    override press instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.setBoundObject(Object)
    Do not use this method - See this github issue
    vialab.SMT.Zone.setData(int, int, int, int)
    vialab.SMT.SMT.setTouchDraw(TouchDraw, int)
    use setTouchDraw( TouchDraw) and setMaxPathLength( int) as separate calls, rather than together.
    vialab.SMT.Zone.touchDownImpl(Touch)
    override touchDown instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.touchImpl()
    override touch instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.touchMovedImpl(Touch)
    override touchMoved instead
    vialab.SMT.Zone.touchUpImpl(Touch)
    override touchUp instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    vialab.SMT.TouchSource.MULTIPLE
    Use TouchSource.AUTOMATIC instead
